comment: /**  * Requests a {@link KvStateLocation} for the specified {@link InternalKvState} registration name.  *  * @param jobId identifying the job for which to request the {@link KvStateLocation}  * @param registrationName Name under which the KvState has been registered.  * @return Future of the requested {@link InternalKvState} location  */
code: /**  * Requests a {@link KvStateLocation} for the specified {@link InternalKvState} registration name.  *  * @param jobId identifying the job for which to request the {@link KvStateLocation}  * @param registrationName Name under which the KvState has been registered.  * @return Future of the requested {@link InternalKvState} location  */ CompletableFuture<KvStateLocation> requestKvStateLocation(final JobID jobId, final String registrationName).
